title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Wroclaw, Poland
description:
Another edition of CodeRetreat in Wroclaw. 
Register at: https://coderetreat-2014-wroclaw.eventbrite.com 
  
Same as last year - we will gather together to improve our TDD skills, and use different platforms and lanugages. It doesn't matter what programming language is your favourite - come and enjoy! 
Event will last for the whole Saturday 15th of November. Food will be provided! 
  
What you need to bring with you: 
- laptop (and a charger for it) 
- your favourtie programming language(s) + your favourite IDE(s)/editor(s) + unit testing library(ies) installed 
  
What we provide: 
- venue: Infusion Office, Heritage Gates Building, Rzeźnicza 28 
- food - lunch & selection of snacks & beverages 
- great atmosphere 
  
Event plan: 
  
9am - event starts 
9.00 - 9.30 - registration 
9.30 - 9.45 - a word about sponsor 
9.45 - 10.00 - introduction to TDD, Game of Life and CodeRetreat idea. Introduction to first session 
10.00 - 10.45 - first session (coding) 
10.45 - 11.00 - retrospecion 
11.00 - 11.45 - second session (coding) 
11.45 - 12.00 - retrospection 
12.00 - 12.45 - third session (coding) 
12.45 - 13.00 - retrospection 
  
13.00 - 14.00 - lunch 
  
14.00 - 14.45 - 4th session (coding) 
14.45 - 15.00 - retrospection 
15.00 - 15.45 - 5th session (coding) 
15.45 - 16.00 - retrospection 
16.00 - 16.45 - 6th session (coding) 
16.45 - 17.00 - retrospection 
17.00 - 17.45 - last session (coding) 
17.45 - 18.00 - retrospection 
18.00 - 18.10 - event summary 
18.10 - ? after event talks, exchaning ideas, heading to pub?
